name: A Night at Fanny's
summary:
In a short parody of the first Five Nights at Freddy's game, you can spend a night with Fanny and friends!

Warning : This game is very difficult, you must listen for the movement patterns.

Fanny FanSteel's Fanaria will blow you away with their new fans, unlike those abominable Fazbear rinky-dinky desk fans. They name their fans "Animatronics", which is odd. We don't entirely understand.

Remember, the fan blades are metal. Watch your fingers. Hold your hats.
